availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Figg (Louisville KY butcher and soldier)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, laborer, butcher, and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Margret Figg. Father of William A. Figg and Charles W. Figg. Laborer in Louisville in 1850. Butcher in Louisville in 1861. Served in the 4th Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.) as a private from October 1861 to December 1863. Served in the 4th Kentucky Veteran Volunteer Cavalry as a private from January 1864 to August 1865.
